snippet: Egyptian authorities jailed an anti-Islamist activist late Tuesday on charges that included insulting President Mohamed Morsi, state news media said.
abstract: Egyptian authorities jail anti-Islamist activist Ahmed Douma on charges that include insulting Pres Mohamed Morsi.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian authorities jailed an anti-Islamist activist late Tuesday on charges that included insulting President Mohamed Morsi, state news media said.

headline.seo: Egypt: Critic of Morsi Is Jailed
headline.main: Egypt: Critic of Morsi Is Jailed
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Anti-Islamist Activist, a Critic of Morsi, Is Jailed
